author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Sorry for being late, had to finish my fruit salad

author: timbeiko
content:
**ACDE 153 TL;DW**
- Shanghai/Capella devnets moving full steam ahead: devnet-3 tested the wei -> gwei unit change on the EL, devnet-4 next week will test mass BLS credential updates
- First Shapella shadow fork happened today: all clients except Erigon (node still syncing) went through it smoothly. Mainnet Shadow Fork scheduled for Monday 
- As discussed here before, we agreed to move forward with the Engine API & EL using `gwei` to represent values
- That said, we **won't** use SSZ to encode the root on the EL. We'll keep RLP for now, and if/when we move to SSZ, it will be for a larger number of fields. 
- We agreed to add 6049 (SELFDESTRUCT deprecation notice) to Shanghai "symbolically" to give the community a heads up. Given 6049 says SD may be removed or altered in functionality, people felt like it captured the right intention even if we went with something like 6190 in the future. 
- We agreed to CFI the EOF EIPs that we removed from Shanghai for Cancun 
- We agreed to give the Network Upgrade Meta Threads a try for Cancun 
- And, a few announcements: 
    - Community call tomorrow (https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/708)
    - EthCatHerders client diversity survey (https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/client-diversity-on-ethereum-network-3854b5c3c95f)
    - KZG ceremony is live at ceremony.ethereum.org 
    - No ACDC next week, ACDE back on the week after

author: timbeiko
content: PR to add EOF EIPs to the Cancun CFI list: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/688

author: timbeiko
content: And, last one, PR to "add" 6049 to Shanghai: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/689
